page.title: 03Badsell Farm Trail Matfield.
page.content: Opening May to December during daylight hours the{farm trail}round the fields,orchards and woodland by signposted route is also mapped out in an{informative leaflet.}Visitors are encouraged to observe the abundant wildlife on the farm. An{information {room}containing a display of moths and butterflies forms the entrance to the pet area. Here we picked up an animal farm{quiz}which helped us study the rare domestic farm animals,including ducks,bantams and rabbits,and further on goats,pigs,cows and sheep. They all seemed very tame,even friendly and all had names on their pens.The breeds are no longer commercially farmed and the owners aim to{conserve}them as part of our{heritage.}With a{shop,picnic area} and{sandwich bar}accommodated in some of the lovely farm buildings it all goes to make a very enjoyable visit.
